TaxonIdentification.subspecies_authority: Hong Wang, C. Song & X. F. Jin

TaxonIdentification.subspecies_name: 瑞安薹草 rui an tai cao

treatment.description: Leaves 12–18 mm wide. Involucral bracts not sheathing. Spikes 3, lowest sessile.
treatment.distribution: ● Moist soil in forests; below 500 m. Zhejiang (Rui’an).
